timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		<name value="Naijíriá Píjin"/>
          
          
            
            		<!-- also known as Naijíriá Píjin -->
          
      
    
    
  

This is the problem, <name/> is duplicated, it may only be a singleton.  https://unicode.org/reports/tr35/tr35-keyboards.html#Element_name
Localization of these names is a separate discussion… maybe worth a separate issue?
timeline.author: srl295
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,327 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!DOCTYPE keyboard
+  SYSTEM '../dtd/ldmlKeyboard.dtd'>
+<keyboard locale="pcm-t-k0-windows">
+	<version number="$Revision$" platform="10"/>
+	<names>
+		<name value="Naijíriá Píjin"/>

timeline.message:
CLDR-13773 Add Nigerian Pidgin (pcm) keyboard

See #536

CLDR-13773 Add Nigerian Pidgin (pcm) keyboard

See #536

timeline.bodyText: This should be C12 not D13, even though the key may be in the D row.
timeline.author: xadxura
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,327 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!DOCTYPE keyboard
+  SYSTEM '../dtd/ldmlKeyboard.dtd'>
+<keyboard locale="pcm-t-k0-windows">
+	<version number="$Revision$" platform="10"/>
+	<names>
+		<!-- also known as Naijíriá Píjin -->
+		<name value="Nigerian Pidgin"/>
+	</names>
+	<settings fallback="omit" transformPartial="hide"/>
+	<keyMap>
+		<map iso="E00" to="̀"/>
+		<map iso="E01" to="1"/>
+		<map iso="E02" to="2"/>
+		<map iso="E03" to="3"/>
+		<map iso="E04" to="4"/>
+		<map iso="E05" to="5"/>
+		<map iso="E06" to="6"/>
+		<map iso="E07" to="7"/>
+		<map iso="E08" to="8"/>
+		<map iso="E09" to="9"/>
+		<map iso="E10" to="0"/>
+		<map iso="E11" to="-"/>
+		<map iso="E12" to="="/>
+		<map iso="D01" to="́"/>
+		<map iso="D02" to="w"/>
+		<map iso="D03" to="e"/>
+		<map iso="D04" to="r"/>
+		<map iso="D05" to="t"/>
+		<map iso="D06" to="y"/>
+		<map iso="D07" to="u"/>
+		<map iso="D08" to="i"/>
+		<map iso="D09" to="o"/>
+		<map iso="D10" to="p"/>
+		<map iso="D11" to="["/>
+		<map iso="D12" to="]"/>
+		<map iso="D13" to="/"/>

timeline.bodyText: C12 and B00 should be defined for compatibility values:
timeline.author: xadxura
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,327 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!DOCTYPE keyboard
+  SYSTEM '../dtd/ldmlKeyboard.dtd'>
+<keyboard locale="pcm-t-k0-windows">
+	<version number="$Revision$" platform="10"/>
+	<names>
+		<!-- also known as Naijíriá Píjin -->
+		<name value="Nigerian Pidgin"/>
+	</names>
+	<settings fallback="omit" transformPartial="hide"/>
+	<keyMap>
+		<map iso="E00" to="̀"/>
+		<map iso="E01" to="1"/>
+		<map iso="E02" to="2"/>
+		<map iso="E03" to="3"/>
+		<map iso="E04" to="4"/>
+		<map iso="E05" to="5"/>
+		<map iso="E06" to="6"/>
+		<map iso="E07" to="7"/>
+		<map iso="E08" to="8"/>
+		<map iso="E09" to="9"/>
+		<map iso="E10" to="0"/>
+		<map iso="E11" to="-"/>
+		<map iso="E12" to="="/>
+		<map iso="D01" to="́"/>
+		<map iso="D02" to="w"/>
+		<map iso="D03" to="e"/>
+		<map iso="D04" to="r"/>
+		<map iso="D05" to="t"/>
+		<map iso="D06" to="y"/>
+		<map iso="D07" to="u"/>
+		<map iso="D08" to="i"/>
+		<map iso="D09" to="o"/>
+		<map iso="D10" to="p"/>
+		<map iso="D11" to="["/>
+		<map iso="D12" to="]"/>
+		<map iso="D13" to="/"/>
+		<map iso="C01" to="a"/>
+		<map iso="C02" to="s"/>
+		<map iso="C03" to="d"/>
+		<map iso="C04" to="f"/>
+		<map iso="C05" to="g"/>
+		<map iso="C06" to="h"/>
+		<map iso="C07" to="j"/>
+		<map iso="C08" to="k"/>
+		<map iso="C09" to="l"/>
+		<map iso="C10" to="ọ"/>
+		<map iso="C11" to="ẹ"/>
+		<map iso="B01" to="z"/>
+		<map iso="B02" to="c"/>
+		<map iso="B03" to="v"/>
+		<map iso="B04" to="b"/>
+		<map iso="B05" to="n"/>
+		<map iso="B06" to="m"/>
+		<map iso="B07" to=","/>
+		<map iso="B08" to="."/>
+		<map iso="B09" to=";"/>
+		<map iso="B10" to="'"/>
+	</keyMap>
+	<keyMap modifiers="shift">
+		<map iso="E00" to="̀"/>
+		<map iso="E01" to="!"/>
+		<map iso="E02" to="@"/>
+		<map iso="E03" to="#"/>
+		<map iso="E04" to="$"/>
+		<map iso="E05" to="₦"/>
+		<map iso="E06" to="%"/>
+		<map iso="E07" to="&"/>
+		<map iso="E08" to="*"/>
+		<map iso="E09" to="("/>
+		<map iso="E10" to=")"/>
+		<map iso="E11" to="_"/>
+		<map iso="E12" to="+"/>
+		<map iso="D01" to="́"/>
+		<map iso="D02" to="W"/>
+		<map iso="D03" to="E"/>
+		<map iso="D04" to="R"/>
+		<map iso="D05" to="T"/>
+		<map iso="D06" to="Y"/>
+		<map iso="D07" to="U"/>
+		<map iso="D08" to="I"/>
+		<map iso="D09" to="O"/>
+		<map iso="D10" to="P"/>
+		<map iso="D11" to="{"/>
+		<map iso="D12" to="}"/>
+		<map iso="D13" to="?"/>
+		<map iso="C01" to="A"/>
+		<map iso="C02" to="S"/>
+		<map iso="C03" to="D"/>
+		<map iso="C04" to="F"/>
+		<map iso="C05" to="G"/>
+		<map iso="C06" to="H"/>
+		<map iso="C07" to="J"/>
+		<map iso="C08" to="K"/>
+		<map iso="C09" to="L"/>
+		<map iso="C10" to="Ọ"/>
+		<map iso="C11" to="Ẹ"/>
+		<map iso="B01" to="Z"/>
+		<map iso="B02" to="C"/>
+		<map iso="B03" to="V"/>
+		<map iso="B04" to="B"/>
+		<map iso="B05" to="N"/>
+		<map iso="B06" to="M"/>
+		<map iso="B07" to="<"/>
+		<map iso="B08" to=">"/>
+		<map iso="B09" to=":"/>
+		<map iso="B10" to="""/>
+	</keyMap>
+	<keyMap modifiers="caps+shift">
+		<map iso="E00" to="`"/>
+		<map iso="E01" to="1"/>
+		<map iso="E02" to="2"/>
+		<map iso="E03" to="3"/>
+		<map iso="E04" to="4"/>
+		<map iso="E05" to="5"/>
+		<map iso="E06" to="6"/>
+		<map iso="E07" to="7"/>
+		<map iso="E08" to="8"/>
+		<map iso="E09" to="9"/>
+		<map iso="E10" to="0"/>
+		<map iso="E11" to="-"/>
+		<map iso="E12" to="="/>
+		<map iso="D01" to="q"/>
+		<map iso="D02" to="w"/>
+		<map iso="D03" to="e"/>
+		<map iso="D04" to="r"/>
+		<map iso="D05" to="t"/>
+		<map iso="D06" to="y"/>
+		<map iso="D07" to="u"/>
+		<map iso="D08" to="i"/>
+		<map iso="D09" to="o"/>
+		<map iso="D10" to="p"/>
+		<map iso="D11" to="["/>
+		<map iso="D12" to="]"/>
+		<map iso="D13" to="\"/>
+		<map iso="C01" to="a"/>
+		<map iso="C02" to="s"/>
+		<map iso="C03" to="d"/>
+		<map iso="C04" to="f"/>
+		<map iso="C05" to="g"/>
+		<map iso="C06" to="h"/>
+		<map iso="C07" to="j"/>
+		<map iso="C08" to="k"/>
+		<map iso="C09" to="l"/>
+		<map iso="C10" to=";"/>
+		<map iso="C11" to="'"/>
+		<map iso="B01" to="z"/>

timeline.bodyText: Keyboards should avoid defining mappings with Ctrl as these will conflict with applications.
timeline.author: xadxura
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,327 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!DOCTYPE keyboard
+  SYSTEM '../dtd/ldmlKeyboard.dtd'>
+<keyboard locale="pcm-t-k0-windows">
+	<version number="$Revision$" platform="10"/>
+	<names>
+		<!-- also known as Naijíriá Píjin -->
+		<name value="Nigerian Pidgin"/>
+	</names>
+	<settings fallback="omit" transformPartial="hide"/>
+	<keyMap>
+		<map iso="E00" to="̀"/>
+		<map iso="E01" to="1"/>
+		<map iso="E02" to="2"/>
+		<map iso="E03" to="3"/>
+		<map iso="E04" to="4"/>
+		<map iso="E05" to="5"/>
+		<map iso="E06" to="6"/>
+		<map iso="E07" to="7"/>
+		<map iso="E08" to="8"/>
+		<map iso="E09" to="9"/>
+		<map iso="E10" to="0"/>
+		<map iso="E11" to="-"/>
+		<map iso="E12" to="="/>
+		<map iso="D01" to="́"/>

replies.bodyText: Either use Right Alt or drop.
replies.author: xadxura

timeline.bodyText: This doubled combining acute maps to a single combining grave, but there is no corresponding double grave to single accute so this doesn't work as a toggle to go back and forth between grave and acute. Also, because the letters followed by grave and acute map to the NFC forms, pressing combining acute twice (D01) won't toggle these accents, so additional transforms are needed to impact those if toggling is the intention of this transformation.
timeline.author: xadxura

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!DOCTYPE keyboard
+  SYSTEM '../dtd/ldmlKeyboard.dtd'>
+<keyboard locale="pcm-t-k0-windows">
+	<version number="$Revision$" platform="10"/>
+	<names>
+		<!-- also known as Naijíriá Píjin -->
+		<name value="Nigerian Pidgin"/>
+	</names>
+	<settings fallback="omit" transformPartial="hide"/>
